snippet: In growing sales, a sign that companies will have to build up their reservoir of goods.
abstract: Commerce Department says wholesalers reduced their inventories in Feb 2013, with decline of 0.3 percent, but that their sales jumped, suggesting that businesses underestimated consumer demand.
lead_paragraph: In growing sales, a sign that companies will have to build up their reservoir of goods.

headline.seo: Inventories Dropped in February, Even as Sales Rose
headline.main: Inventories Fall as Sales Rise, a Hint That Goods Are Needed
headline.print_headline: Inventories Fall as Sales Rise, A Hint That Goods Are Needed
